title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. F, pt. 279 - HAZARD ANALYSIS AND CRITICAL CONTROL POINT (HACCP) PLAN FOR SEAFOOD
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. F, pt. 279 - HAZARD ANALYSIS AND CRITICAL CONTROL POINT (HACCP) PLAN FOR SEAFOOD
State Regulations
§ 279.1 - Hazard analysis and critical control point (HACCP) plan for seafood

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. F, pt. 279

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§16, 18, 214-b, 215-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
